CustomSql.Name: topic
CustomSql.SqlQuery:
with feed AS 
    (SELECT DISTINCT tw.db_created_at AS created_at,
         tw.id_str,
         tw.platform,
         tw.account_name,
         tw.user.id_str AS source,
         tw.user.name AS name,
         tw.in_reply_to_screen_name
    FROM socialmediadb.twfeedstorage tw
    WHERE tw.db_created_at > current_timestamp - interval '15' day
    UNION
    SELECT DISTINCT rss.created_at,
         rss.id_str,
         rss.platform,
         rss.account_name,
         rss.entities.urls[1].expanded_url AS source,
         rss.metadata.topic AS name,
         rss.metadata.website
    FROM socialmediadb.newsfeedstorage rss
    WHERE rss.created_at > current_timestamp - interval '15' day
        AND
    cardinality(rss.entities.urls) > 0    UNION
    SELECT DISTINCT y.created_at,
         y.id_str,
         y.platform,
         y.account_name,
         y.video_id AS source,
         y.title,
         y.parent_id
    FROM socialmediadb.youtubecomments y
    WHERE y.created_at > current_timestamp - interval '15' day ), sentiment AS 
    (SELECT DISTINCT sentiment,
         created_at,
         id_str,
         text,
         translated_text,
         platform,
         account_name
    FROM socialmediadb.sentiment
    WHERE created_at > current_timestamp - interval '15' day ), topicmappings AS 
    (SELECT DISTINCT platform,
         job_id,
         job_timestamp,
         topic,
         id_str
    FROM socialmediadb.topicmappings
    WHERE created_at > current_timestamp - interval '15' day ), topics AS 
    (SELECT DISTINCT topic,
         job_timestamp,
         job_id,
         term
    FROM socialmediadb.topics
    WHERE created_at > current_timestamp - interval '15' day )
SELECT DISTINCT s.platform,
         s.account_name,
         s.sentiment,
         s.id_str,
         s.text,
         s.translated_text,
         s.created_at,
         tm.topic,
         tm.job_timestamp,
         tm.job_id,
         t.term,
         feed.source,
         feed.name,
         feed.in_reply_to_screen_name
FROM sentiment s
JOIN feed
    ON (s.id_str = feed.id_str)
JOIN topicmappings tm
    ON (tm.id_str = s.id_str
        AND tm.platform = s.platform)
JOIN topics t
    ON (t.topic = tm.topic
        AND t.job_id = tm.job_id
        AND t.job_timestamp = tm.job_timestamp)
WHERE s.translated_text LIKE concat('%', t.term, '%')

Columns.Expression: ifelse({platform} = 'twitter', concat('twitter.com/anyuser/status/',{id_str}), ifelse({platform} = 'youtubecomments', concat('www.youtube.com/watch?v=', {source}), substring({source}, strlen('https://')+1, strlen({source})+1)))
